column2: The idea of producing my own heir is either impossible or revolting. Perhaps I should adopt...
This character was adopted at a young age, and shares no blood ties to their parent. The feudal nobility turn their nose at such an act...
I have chosen to adopt an heir. Should they be a boy, or a girl?
This character is bound in matrimony to another man. Their dynasty may disapprove...
This character is bound in matrimony to another man. Their dynasty may disapprove...
This character is bound in matrimony to another woman. Their dynasty may disapprove...
This character is bound in matrimony to another woman. Their dynasty may disapprove...
Whilst it is very much frowned upon, it is tolerated for Qingzhen rulers to take more than one spouse...
Although forbidden in most faiths, my faith would permit me to marry another woman. Considering my preferences, this is perhaps more appealing...
Although forbidden in most faiths, my faith would permit me to marry another man. Considering my preferences, this is perhaps more appealing...
They are in love with you!
Gay marriage is begrudgingly permitted in Branch Ceticism, but taboo
This kind of love is an abomination!
I am not attracted to that sex!
ßGCharacters of the same sex may marry eachotherß!
Rulers will be able to adopt if their fertility is impaired and in select religion groups, or old and without heir.
Rulers will not be able to adopt.

Gaians, Thelemites, Neognostics, Reform Jews, Nonconformists, Voodoo, Santeria, equality reformed pagans, and adherents of Santa Muerte and the Way of the Branch will be able to perform gay marriages through a targeted decision.
Every religion will be able to perform gay marriages through a targeted decision.
No religions will have gay marriages.
